title: (x) Jens Lekman curly 60s-inspired script - Julia Script (hand rendered) {Marcelo}
content:
What’s this cool, psychedelic script? I’m really digging it!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055605im_/http:/typophile.com/files/jens_5177.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055605im_/http:/typophile.com/files/black%20moth_3756.jpg)

 [‹ PLS HELP ME](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055605/http:/typophile.com/node/44250 "Go to previous forum topic") [Serif font similar to Century Schoolbook & Big Caslon ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055605/http:/typophile.com/node/44248 "Go to next forum topic")
author: toog

comments.content: The designer hand rendered [Candice](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055605/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=candice), so you won’t find this one as an exact match I’m afraid.

Weird—it’s actually two different designers! And Julia is dope!!

\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Awesome\>\> [www.biklopsdesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080629055605/http:/www.biklopsdesign.com/ "www.biklopsdesign.com")
Argh! I meant Julia. My mistake. The FontShop.com CSS was behaving erratically so I couldn’t bring up a sample when I (did not) made that identification.
